description:
Punctures happen, having a good pump (and a tube) along for the ride can get you back on the road in no time. With its compact design and up to 120PSI of pressure, the Sport Drive HP (High Pressure) is a worthwhile addition to your kit.

  • Overlapping design contains a flexible hose for easy pumping
  • Threads onto both Schraeder and Presta valves
  • Light, strong machined aluminum barrel and piston
  • Pumps up to 120psi
  • Bottle cage frame mount included
name: Lezyne Sport Drive HP Pump
